Big Opportunities.

3K - 12th Grade

Aiken Prep is more than a school.
It is a home where young people strive 
to realize the best of their capabilities.
Read more from our students about
their experiences at Aiken Prep.

Saturday, March 3rd, 2012.

Tennis Team, greater Augusta / Aiken
are the Private Middle School League
2011 Champs! Read More.

AIKEN PREPARATORY SCHOOL
has been committed to fostering
academic excellence in our community
for more than 95 years.

exceptional school
located in beautiful
